text: @jeffsessions @realDonaldTrump @JoeBiden All I seen was a lot of (I I I ME ME ME). Nothing on the American people who lost their lives to covid19.  Nothing to help with the protests. At least @JoeBiden walked out to talk with #WeThePeople
